mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over (order by common_code) AS id ,common_code as COMM_CODE /*공통코드*/ ,common_code_name as COMM_CDNM /*공통코드명*/ ,system_code as SYST_CODE /*시스템코드*/ ,division_code as CDGB_CODE /*코드구분코드*/ ,common_code_length as COCD_LNTH /*세부코드길이*/ FROM common_code_header WHERE (LOCATE(#{COMM_CDNM}, common_code_name) OR LOCATE(#{COMM_CDNM}, common_code)) ORDER BY common_code
